headline: Florida Supreme Court Justice Alan Lawson to retire in August
author: Jim Saunders
sentences: One of the greatest joys of my 35-year legal career has been and continues to be the ability to work alongside a bench and bar filled with extraordinary individuals who work tirelessly to assure that the citizens we serve are well-served by our system of justice,? Lawson, 60, wrote in a retirement letter to DeSantis.
